MODULE.name: ConnectionChecking
MODULE.MORE_HELP: This is example of API. Implementation contain in extension.

PROPERTIES.DESC: list of properties supported by instance of object

PROPERTY.name: hostURL
PROPERTY.DESC: The URL to be checked for connection

PROPERTY.name: trackConnection
PROPERTY.DESC: whether this feature to be implemeneted or not

PROPERTY.name: timeout
PROPERTY.DESC: The total time for checking the connection.

PROPERTY.name: pollInterval
PROPERTY.DESC: The time gap between sucessive cheking.

PROPERTY.name: message
PROPERTY.DESC: The message to be displayed during connection checking
